channel.description:
Bug fixes, bug fixes and bug fixes. -Corrected a block duplication bug when using pistons -Corrected a redstone torch duplication bug when using pistons -Corrected a client crash when placing a sign in front of the piston, powering the piston and then removing the block beneath the sign -Ice blocks are now pushed without causing water streams breaking everything -Booster rails are no longer being powered magically without a power source -Pistons connected to the end of a piston-transistor via redstone are now properly closed when the power goes out -Doors no longer create purple particles -Hacking clients can no longer edit texts of placed signs in multiplayer -Changed so that paintings pushed by pistons will pop off
Interesting choice he did with the signs, but the dupe is fixed LETS UPDATE

[/quote]
What is this bullshit?[/quote]I’m guessing that there was a packet that allowed you to edit sign text without destroying+replacing it, but this was never actually implemented on the official client?

item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Bug fixes, bug fixes and bug fixes.
-Corrected a block duplication bug when using pistons
-Corrected a redstone torch duplication bug when using pistons
-Corrected a client crash when placing a sign in front of the piston, powering the piston and then removing the block beneath the sign
-Ice blocks are now pushed without causing water streams breaking everything
-Booster rails are no longer being powered magically without a power source
-Pistons connected to the end of a piston-transistor via redstone are now properly closed when the power goes out
-Doors no longer create purple particles
-Hacking clients can no longer edit texts of placed signs in multiplayer
-Changed so that paintings pushed by pistons will pop off

Interesting choice he did with the signs, but the dupe is fixed
